name: Huffine Hefe
description: This traditional Hefeweizen features aromas of banana, bubblegum, and clove. With a light body and wheat base, this beer is perfect for tipping back a few.

name: Trout Train
description: This classic German Pilsner features Bavarian Pilsner malt imported from Germany, with noble hop character and that crisp clean finish you would expect!

name: Dad Bod Blonde
description: This easy drinker has a light, bready character with a subtle hop finish! Perfect for those sunny days mowing the lawn in you New Balance shoes!

name: Ewe Talkin' To Me?
description: Smooth German lager with light hop character and notes of light biscuit and caramel. Showcases elegant German malt flavors without being too heavy or filling, you'll be sure to want another.

name: Pika Pale Ale
description: This all Citra Pale Ale is an ode to our brewers research subject for his Master's degree, where he studied these cute animals in the high Alpine Mountains across the intermountain west at Montana State University!

name: Locals Only
description: This rotating series will always feature 100% hops and malt grown in the Gallatin Valley! While you don't have to be a local to drink it, everyone can enjoy it knowing it's 100% locally grown and sourced ingredients! Partnering with Crooked Yard Hops and Gallatin Valley Malting Company.

name: Better Daze
description: After a few tumultuous years we all deserve to look forward to Better Daze! This hop forward hazy IPA is bursting with those tropical fruity flavors!

name: A Boy Named Jake
description: This gluten reduced, Fresh Hop pale ale was brewed with fresh cascade from Crooked Yard Hops and US Strata. It packs a strong stone fruit aroma coupled with lots of pine and citrus. This session of pale ale is sure to please.

name: Mini Battle Goats
description: Named after our Owner's rowdy miniature goats, this full-bodied NE IPA features Galaxy, Strata, and Vic Secret hops, creating a sweet hop flavor and notes of tropical fruit, candy and citrus.

name: Sleeping Giant
description: A silky smooth stout bursting with notes of chocolate, coffee and roasted malt. Not too sweet, not too bitter, it's just right.

name: On The Rocks
description: An ode to the Owner's heritage and love of good whiskey. On The Rocks is a smooth scotch ale, perfect for drinking on a chilly winter night. This brew features a rich malt character with notes of chocolate, coffee and caramel.

name: Birthday Bourbon
description: Aged in bourbon barrels for over 8 months, this smooth drinking stout is sure to please. Featuring notes of vanilla, oak and coffee, this stout is perfect for curling up next to a fireplace, or just relaxing at the brewer. Released just in time for our 1 year anniversary!

name: Palisade Falls
description: Pink Guava punctuates this pretty pink sour. Packing potent pink guava aroma and flavor. This beer has a tart, but refreshing finish. Perfectly poised to please!

name: Hot Mom Carda-Bomb
description: This beer boats a light citrusy aroma, complementing a dry cranberry finish with a final hint of cardamom. Perfect combination of flavors for a winter season!

name: Last Place Lager
description: This hybrid style features all of the hops characteristics of a modern IPA or Pale Ale with a crisp, clean finish you would expect from a lager. Hop heads and dads can rejoice over this unique style of beer!
